review: Works as advertised.  But I found my Xbox One will also post youtube videos to the TV in the same manner as this.  So actually I don't really need it.
author: Jimyster "These  days I enjoy mostly SciFi and Techno Thrillers."

review: Part of my son-in-law's migration from his carrier.  I just read in Money magazine of large migration of subscribers away from media networks.
author: Daniel L. Harris

review: I got this a week ago from Walmart and LOVE it. It's really easy to set up you plug it in and go to the website that is on your TV. And BAM you sign into your WIFI and your done. I love the the picture is clear and in HD.
author: Khelsey Jackson "Khelsey"

review: Compact, easy to set up, just needs more apps!!  Can't began to explain how easy the set up was for me!
author: RKOHawkins

review: Works great, easy to install.  Great product, does what it says. Would recommend.  Great price.  gave as Christmas presents and it was a hit, even for the doubting one.
author: JanD

review: Excellent device. Simple installation and setup. Many apps and extensions available to access several sources. Can't wait for a Google Music app that allows chromecasting.
author: Clyde W. Stitt

review: Wasn't completely satisfied because I wasnt able to transfer my personal pictures and/or videos to my t.v screen. My dvd player already has Netflix, web, and hulu built in it . chromecast was like a waste of money for me.
author: William holmes

review: Works exactly how it says. I keep finding more and more uses for it. I'm looking forward to more apps that are compatible.
author: jeanobiz

review: Really easy to install anda works great. Just love it, muy facil de intalar y funciona muy bien. No te arrepentiras!!!
author: FORTOLEO

review: I've been using it for a few weeks now and I absolutely love this thing.  Using Plex, can even stream movies from my PC right to any TV in the house.  It's worth every penny.
author: Jeff Greth
